alfredsnippet.snippet:
"H.P. Blavatsky writes:

'It is impossible to conceive anything without a cause; the attempt to do so makes the mind a blank.' This implies that there must be a great many scientists walking around with blank minds!"

- David Pratt the Theosophist
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Do Scientists Walk Around With Blank Minds?
